internationalInstructions: Form Fields must be filled out using only Latin characters.

home.title: Get a Digital Library Card Today in a Few Easy Steps

description.part1: If you are 13 or older and live, work, attend school, or pay property taxes in New York State, you can get a free digital library card right now using this online form. Visitors to New York State can also use this form to apply for a temporary card.
description.part2: With a digital library card you get free access to the Library’s wide array of digital resources—including e-books, databases, educational resources, and more.
description.part3: By submitting an application, you understand and agree to our Cardholder Terms and Conditions and agree to our Rules and Regulations. To learn more about the Library’s use of personal information, please read our Privacy Policy.

personal.title: مرحلہ 1 از 5: ذاتی معلومات

instruction.part2: If you are an international patron, please enter your date of birth in MM/DD/YYYY format

personal.ageGate: Yes, I am over 13 years old.

email.label: Email Address
email.instruction: An email address is required to use many of our digital resources, such as e-books. If you do not wish to provide an email address, you can apply for a physical card using our alternate form. Once filled out, please visit one of our locations with proof of identity and home address to pick up your card.

eCommunications.labelText: Yes, I would like to receive information about NYPL's programs and services

errorMessage.firstName: براہِ کرم ایک معتبر پہلا نام درج کریں۔
errorMessage.lastName: براہِ کرم ایک معتبر آخری نام درج کریں۔
errorMessage.birthdate: براہِ کرم ایک معتبر تاریخ درج کریں، س س س س/د د/م م، بشمول سلیشز۔
errorMessage.ageGate: You must be 13 years or older to continue.
errorMessage.email: براہِ کرم ایک معتبر ای میل ایڈریس لکھیں۔

internationalInstructions.part1: In order for your address to be successfully verified, it must be a valid residential address in the United States.
internationalInstructions.part2: If you are an international student, please provide the address of your institution.You will only receive a temporary card and will need to contact NYPL within 2 weeks to have your card extended.
internationalInstructions.part3: If you are an international research patron, please use the Stephen A. Schwarzman Building address as your home address. You will only receive a temporary card and will need to contact the research division at NYPL within 2 weeks to have your card appropriately marked as a research card.

address.title: Home Address
address.description: If you live in NYC, please fill out the home address form.

description.part1: The application process is slightly different depending on whether you live, work, go to school, or pay property taxes in New York City, elsewhere in New York State, or elsewhere in the United States and you're just visiting New York City. Please select one of the following and fill out the required fields.
description.part2: If you work or go to school in NYC please provide the address.

errorMessage.line1: براہِ کرم ایک معتبر گلی کا پتہ درج کریں۔
errorMessage.city: براہِ کرم ایک معتبر شہر درج کریں۔
errorMessage.state: براہِ کرم ریاست کا 2-حروف والا مخفف درج کریں۔
errorMessage.zip: براہِ کرم 5 یا 9 ہندسوں کا ڈاک کوڈ درج کریں۔

account.title: مرحلہ 4 از 5: اپنے اکاؤنٹ کو حسب ضرورت بنائیں
account.description: Create a username and password so you can log in and manage your account or access an array of our digital resources. Your username should be unique.

password.label: Password
password.instruction:
We encourage you to select a strong password that includes: at least 8 characters, a mixture of uppercase and lowercase letters, a mixture of letters and numbers, and at least one special character except period (.)
Example: MyLib1731@
Password cannot contain common patterns such as consecutively repeating a character three or more times, e.g. aaaatf54 or repeating a pattern, e.g. abcabcab

library.placeholder: Type a library name, such as Parkchester Library
library.title: Home Library

description.part1: Choosing a home library will help us make sure you're getting everything you need from a branch that's most convenient for you.
description.part2: You can skip this step and update it at any point through your account.

termsAndCondition.label: Yes, I accept the terms and conditions.
termsAndCondition.text: By submitting an application, you understand and agree to our Cardholder Terms and Conditions and agree to our Rules and Regulations. To learn more about the Library’s use of personal information, please read our Privacy Policy.

errorMessage.username: صارف کا نام 25-5 حروف کے درمیان ہونا لازمی ہے۔
errorMessage.password: آپ کا پاس ورڈ کم از کم 8 حروف کا ہونا لازمی ہے، بشمول بڑے اور چھوٹے دونوں حروف کا مرکب، بشمول حروف اور اعداد کے مرکب ، اور اس میں وقفے (.) کے سوا کم از کم ایک خاص حرف ہو۔
errorMessage.verifyPassword: دونوں پاس ورڈ آپس میں نہیں ملتے۔
errorMessage.acceptTerms: شرائط و ضوابط کو چیک کرنا لازمی ہے۔

review.title: مرحلہ 5 از 5: اپنی معلومات کی تصدیق کریں
review.description: Make sure all the information you’ve entered is correct. If needed, you can still make changes before you submit your application.
review.receiveNewsletter: Receive information about NYPL's programs and services
review.nextStep: After you submit your application, you will see a confirmation page with your account information, and you will be able to log in and request books and materials.

confirmation.title: Congratulations! You now have a digital New York Public Library card.

description.part1: Print or save this information for your records. Within 24 hours, you will receive an email with the details of your account.
description.part2: To borrow physical materials, please visit one of our locations with a valid photo ID and proof of address to complete the application for a physical card.
description.part3: This is a temporary card and will expire in 14 days. If you are a student in a New York–accredited college, an employee at a NYC company but not physically in the city or state, or a researcher who will be visiting one of our research centers, contact gethelp@nypl.org to update your card.

apiErrors.defaultError: جمع کرانے میں ایک مسئلہ تھا۔
